website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a toy that's plushy, interactive, and appealing to all ages, Roarin' Ivory is a lovable choice made for kids age four and older.
pros: So adorable, even adults love this interactive tiger that makes more than 100 sounds and movements
Roars, blinks, reacts to a toy, responds when hugged, and more
In addition to being interactive, Ivory is soft and cuddly
cons: Putting the batteries in place can be a little difficult

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot in the way of "educational value", more like a dolly to carry around and adore. A great idea for kids who can't have a real pet due to allergies, space, etc. The white tiger was a Toys R Us exclusive that has now migrated over to amazon. The orange tiger can be had at Wal * mart for a significant discount over any other retailer. They purr, roar, meow, sneeze and toot with the help of 4 C batteries. Senors on the back and the head help her or him respond to pets and noises.
customer_reviews.author: JXStarr

customer_reviews.title: So soft and adorable. Bought it for my Beloved (supposedly we're both ...
customer_reviews.text: Rawr! So soft and adorable. Bought it for my Beloved (supposedly we're both adults,) and almost stole it from her. Great St. Valentine's Day present, if you need an excuse, although I never need a reason to make her smile.
customer_reviews.author: LDW

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for the hype, not all it's chalked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. It's fluffy. It moves. It blinks. It purrs. Buuuut...that's about it. The hype on this product can easily be called exaggerated, ESPECIALLY for such an expensive toy. I got this one at an extremely discounted rate, thankfully, but if I'd actually seen it in action, I never would've bought it. Granddaughter never uses it. The most disappointing thing is that it's just a hard piece of plastic covered in soft, THIN furr. It's not really something a kid wants to hug on. They should've given it some padding or something, not make it a moving rock in a pretty pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. Doesn't do as much as I thought it would, but it is still cute. This is actually going to stay at grandma's house so the grandkids can play with it here. It does not respond to its toy at all, that function is useless. Me and my granddaughters enjoy just talking to it and watching its motions. Really glad I bought it for less than half price too because full price is way overpriced. Yes, it is hard as others have mentioned, but it is an electronic toy not a stuffed animal and I didn't expect anything different. All in all it is a fun toy for grandma...
customer_reviews.author: RaNae

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: This toy was very cute, but within half an hour it had stopped working properly. It started making a loud gear grinding noise, and stopped moving. It's also not as interactive as I was hoping it would be. It will roar back at you - but that's pretty much it. Even if this toy worked properly and didn't break, I'm still not sure I could give it 5 stars as it's something that probably would have been interesting for a few hours and then would have sat in a corner collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Ivory is very entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave me Roarin Ivory for my birthday. It is the most adorable "toy". The actions are so cute, but the sounds she makes just cannot help but make me smile and even laugh out loud. I have taken her to visit several friends and everyone is "taken" with her. She is trouble free, unlike my "real" cats. They ignore her when she Roars. I gave one to a friend for her birthday and she loves it also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the eyes
customer_reviews.text: Oh my!!!! Cute,cute,cute! I love the eyes, the growl, the sneeze and the interaction. I bought Tyler for myself and Ivory for my mother. She is 82 and doesn't want to clean up after a pet. This is the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with this tiger. She brings it everywhere, even to the dentist to get its teeth checked.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My 3 years old niece loved this. Her big purple glittery eyes and roaring sound was a big hit at Christmas. We love how many sounds there are, she will even sing little bits and pieces of songs now and then, lol. She carries this around by the tail, and it seams to work fine with no motor issues. Very soft as well, good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: HappyHippy

customer_reviews.title: Surprise Gift
customer_reviews.text: I am a 5th grade teacher and I have a student who I could tell would not have a great Christmas. I asked her what she wanted for Christmas and she said a fur real snow tiger. She said she had been asking for it since kindergarten. I ordered it and surprised her with it. She loves it and brought it to school to show me how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old has the orange and black one and my 1 year old kept stealing it so we got the white one for her so the arguing would stop. Lol. They live these tigers. They're soooo soft and super cute and keep my kids very entertained. The noise isn't so loud that I find it annoying which is great. And it goes to "sleep" if it isn't touched for a while but wakes back up when they pet it's back again so it saves the battery life. It takes c batteries but they seem to last quite a while so I'm not replacing them all the time. We love this toy here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute, but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and visually appealing. Only interactive to the point of roaring back when you 'roar.' I guess if you count every tiny, individual movement and sound, it totals 100+, but pretty much the same cycle of basic responses. Probably best for small children who are easily amused.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my girls 4 and 7 years old... the only thing I can say - it's fantastic! they played all day with such an interest. It looks and acts as if it is alive. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this (on black Friday) FurReal ivory interative tiger for my grand daughter for Christmas, and she still plays with it. It is so soft, but well made. Has lots of sounds and motions.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R

customer_reviews.title: Great find at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to find him on Amazon since he was originally a Toys R Us exclusive.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun and cute toy. My son is obsessed with cats, and this one has so many different sounds. It was a lot bigger than we had anticipated. It also takes odd c batteries, but hopefully they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Ficek

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great gift for my 9 year old. It is a bit on the larger side, but no complaints on the quality. So far it has held up with lots of playing and snuggling. It was a true winner at Christmas time.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, adorable,Ivory was a gift for my 4yr old grandson, he loves plush tigers. He was so surprised by the roads and purrs. He kept growling and her for awhile. Happy Christmas day!

customer_reviews.title: Fun and large
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable product our grandson loved it and it is so soft just like petting a real cat. I wish it had more interaction but it was fun for him as a four-year-old. Also it is as big as a large cat.
customer_reviews.author: Dagwood&Blondie

customer_reviews.title: but my granddaughter loved it. I think the FurReal Friends which come ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a slight problem with our Ivory; but my granddaughter loved it. I think the FurReal Friends which come directly from Hasbro are the best.

customer_reviews.title: Amzing toy at amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Hey ya all!! This toy is AMAZING!! Its a very large toy which is great and I got it at an AMAZING price!! My grandson will love this!! Super excited to give it to him!!

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft tiger but it doesn’t do much and the roar quickly becomes annoying. I don’t care how many combinations you claim it makes, it doesn’t do much. The tiger was played with for 2 days and hasn’t been touched since. It needs to move or interact with other pets. Not much interaction for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value for these products. My granddaughter loved it.

product_meta.title: FurReal Roarin’ Ivory, The Playful Tiger Interactive Plush Toy, 100+ Sound-&-Motion Combinations, Ages 4 & Up (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: The furReal Roarin’ Ivory, the Playful Tiger Interactive Plush Toy is ready to play, and her favorite way to have fun is to ROAR! Roar at her or make a noise, she responds by roaring back! Incredibly realistic pet responds to sounds and touch with 100+ sound-&-motion combinations. Talk to her (or roar!) and she roars back. Pet her forehead, muzzle, or back and she responds with sounds and movement -- she can move her eyes, ears, head, mouth, and tail! Pet this cuddly cub and watch her eyes close as she purrs. She crouches down when she’s feeling playful and moves her tail when she’s ready for fun. It’s fun to watch her lean down and pose playfully as she lets out a big ol’ roar! She even has a cute little chicken toy that she reacts to -- just place it in her mouth and press down, and watch her respond! And with poseable back legs, she can be hugged and cuddled. (Clicking sounds when her legs are moved are just fine.) This is one fun-lovin’ -- and loveable -- jungle pet for kids ages 4 and up. furReal and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: REALISTIC, INTERACTIVE PLUSH PET RESPONDS TO SOUNDS: Roar at the furReal Roarin’ Ivory, the Playful Tiger Interactive Plush Toy and she’ll roar back
100+ SOUND-&-MOTION COMBINATIONS: She can move her eyes, ears, head, mouth, and tail! Watch her lean down and pose playfully as she lets out a roar
REACTS TO HER PLAY TOY: Who doesn’t love a rubbery chicken toy to play with? Listen to her make fun snacking noises when you put the toy in her mouth
SO PLAYFUL AND SNUGGLY: This adorable tiger plush toy loves to cuddle and responds with sweet sounds when you hold her
GREAT BIRTHDAY OR HOLIDAY GIFT: Interactive toy is a fantastic gift for girls and boys ages 4 and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars197 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
